phrases.error.packages.sms.error.smses.sent.send: Warn about SMSes sent by this user
This user has sent a SMS or SMSs; If you delete the user, all SMSes sent by this user will be deleted!
phrases.packages.sms.error.smses.sent.sender_use: You can view the SMSes sent by this user using the link below.
If you want to view the SMSes sent by this user, ask the person who has this access.
View SMS sent by this user
phrases.error.packages.sms.error.smses.sent.rece: Warn about SMSes sent to this user
SMS or SMSes have been sent to this user; If the user is deleted, all SMSes sent to this user in the system will be deleted!
phrases.packages.sms.error.smses.sent.receiver_u: You can view the SMSes sent to this user using the following link.
If you want to view the SMSes sent to this user, ask the person who has this access.
View SMS sent to this user
phrases.error.packages.sms.error.smses.get.sende: Warn about SMSes received from this user
SMS or SMSes received from this user; If the user is deleted, all SMSes received from this user in the system will be deleted!
phrases.packages.sms.error.smses.get.sender_user: You can view the SMSes received from this user using the link below.
If you want to view the SMSes received from this user, ask the person who has this access.
View SMS received from this user
